Title: Quality of legislation: Focus on smart EU and post-smart transposition
Abstract: © 2014, Hart Publishing Ltd. All rights reserved.This article explores legislative quality under the Smart Regulation framework, and critically assesses the further challenges of transposition after Smart. The prism through which the topic is viewed is solely legislative drafting, also ex-pressed in civil law jurisdictions as law-making teclmiques. The standard by which EU legislation and national transposition measures are to be quality assessed is effectiveness of EU and national legislation defined as their ability to produce the desired regulatory results.
